verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Whom have I in heaven but You? There is nothing on earth I desire beside You. My heart and my strength So many times they fail. But there is one truth, That always will prevail …{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God is the strength of my heart, God is the strength of my heart, God is the strength of my heart And my portion forever (repeat) Forever …..{/lang-eng}
